quiz.question: Which insurers currently form our Home Insurance panel?

answers.a: AXA, LV=Broker, Prestige, RSA, UK General and Zurich
answers.b: Ageas, Allianz, Aviva, Towergate, L&G and LV=Broker
answers.c: AXA, Allianz, Aviva, Canopius, Towergate, L&G and RSA
